document.full_text: in the latest twist to his increasingly frustrating season, jorge posada was scheduled to hit ninth for the yankees against the red sox on saturday before he removed himself from the lineup.
document.title: posada sits rather than hit ninth in the lineup
lines_and_colors: in the latest twist to his increasingly frustrating season, jorge posada was scheduled to hit ninth for the yankees against the red sox on saturday before he removed himself from the lineup.
